ComicInfo.Title: Graham's Workshop; Snowball Fright
ComicInfo.Summary:
Three words: MAD SCIENTIST MONKEY.
Graham–Jamaa’s resident banana-chomping genius–takes center stage in this exciting issue of Dynamite Entertainment’s ANIMAL JAM, based on the MASSIVELY popular video game by National Geographic and WildWorks (with over 70 million players worldwide)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Fernando Ruiz & Peter Pantazis | 1 | B | Cover B | Tony Fleecs | 2 | C | Coloring Book Cover C | Fernando Ruiz | 3 |
